metadata.name: Grizzlies #1
metadata.description: Grizzlies is a community driven collectibles project featuring 1590 well dressed bears that have taken a break from munching on salmon to join the Metaverse. Much like human-kind, no two Grizzlies are alike, all dressed from their own closets and unique in their own ways. Your Grizzlies doubles as your $almon membership token, and grants access to the Grizzlies Club for benefits like exclusive airdrops, raffles, community giveaways, and more fun events. Our vision is to bring more joy to the world and bring people together through community, creativity, and fun art!. Visit [grizzliesnft.io](https://grizzliesnft.io) for more details.
